Package ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380

Class AdvertisementDisplay

java.lang.Object
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.Display
ca.ucalgary.edu.ensf380.AdvertisementDisplay
public final class AdvertisementDisplay extends Display
Displays advertisements and the train map by passing train map and all trains
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mark Guerta, Saif Youssef

      Parameters:

      currentTrain - The train currently being tracked
      stationArray - Contains all station details
